Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights hotel happy staff friendly helpful especially booked return journey airport clean beds hard comfortable linen changed daily breakfast menu limited choice plentiful 10minute walk shops easy rome 3star 4 recommend short stay

Reviews.Title: “Good for weekend visit”
Reviews.Author: Brian H
Reviews.Content: located town 10 minute walk metro approx six stops 20 city centre class 2 star 4 star basic clean staff friendly except barman everthing effort serve bar hours limited told 7 pm times suit breakfast definately star hot food advised previous tripadvisor review restaurant torre located esso petrol station top road hotel walk 5 mins excellent food value visit cafe road 2 beers 1 toasted sandwich 175 euros ripoff

Reviews.Content: deal hotel money paid passable sheets changed daily beds little hard common trait europe breakfast write home look forward tried day custom gregorys bar road served fab coffee lush lovely reasonable restaurant esso garage ate couple nights definitely recommend restaurants bars walk top road towards metro city day eat plenty options locally metro convenient plenty buses taxi bak leonardo da vinci airport booked hotel reasonable 45 euros probably try stay bit closer centre enjoyable time rome

Reviews.Title: “Four star in drag!”
Reviews.Author: June H
Reviews.Content: ive stayed lot hotels world 3 4 5 star hotel rated stars dated shabby grubby little creature comforts amenities double beds rock hard twin mattresses placed wooden box ripped sheets single blankets thin pillows 1 darned bed cover stained walls ceilings damaged floors tv didnt single glazed windows busynoisy road teacoffee wifi hand towels linen tea towels toilet seat wasnt fitted correctly cigarette burn bath green taps leaking pipe fix constant drip drip night joined traffic noise whilst lay hard uncomfortable bed unable sleep restaurant resembled school canteen wooden chairs dirty walls barred fire exit pieces hand written reserved signs tables hordes students occupied lower floors breakfast hard rolls processed cheese ham watery juice machine drip tray didnt bare investigation public toilet outside restaurant locks cubicle doors broken tiles walls floor sink rest hotel clean hotel badly refurbishing recommend avoid costs

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Stockton on the Forest, United Kingdom
Reviews.Title: “No way is it a 4star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Carole J
Reviews.Content: arrival informed tax pay stay 3euros person nightthe hotel clean staff friendly breakfast poor sliced cheese sliced ham cereals bread hotel approx nearest metro 1520 mins bus ride centre rome takes 40 mins taxi airport eat restaurant evening told bar 630pm closed time 10pm entertainment internet access available lounge empty pool appear metro tickets available tobacconist shop hotel excellent chinese restaurant approx 300 mtrs hotel superb reasonably priced hotel complete revamp live 4star hotel

Reviews.Content: read reviews hotel visit dread hotel worried granted modern hotel clean spacious mini bar sheets towels changed everyday curtains layered kept sunlight brilliantly breakfast typically european wide range cereals pastries spreads cheese cold meats bread rolls choice fresh juice tea coffee centre rome 5mins vatican metro public transport links brilliant

Reviews.Title: “does exactly what it says on the tin”

Reviews.Content: marc aurelio 3 star hotel arrive exactly 3 star hotel thrills luxuries extra mile thats exactly expected 3 star hotel neither dismayed nor paid mentioned location 5 minute walk station 34 stops vatican city 78 central terminus dont people moaning breakfast isnt cooked italy 3 star expect continental thats norm yes selection wasnt 4 cereals offer croissants bread rolls ham cheese matter italy breakfast youre looking forward lazy lunches dinners looking piazzas plenty space store clothes etc mattress extremely stiff pillows upgrade cleaner noticed using extra bedclothes plump pillows supplied extra observant marc aurelio hotel stayed 3 hotel list youre packing doing city break budget perfect luxuries youll dig little deeper pocket

Reviews.Content: friend stayed hotel 10 nights julyaugust 2010 reading reviews site worried terrible decision worrying needless hotel excellent ill break review simple location granted hotel fair distance airports port miles central rome latter pretty null hotel close major road buses centre pretty 510 mins hotel 510 minute walk cornelia metro station walk metro pleasant bins route sometimes smell people complained bins disappear head residential onto main road leading metro station lined shops stalls overall pleased location hotel people suggested central rome nonsense cornelia metro station 4 stops vatican 10 minutes 9 termini 25 minutes initially double bed discovered 2 single beds placed simple pulled apart 2 singles clean tidy visible earlier reviews bathroom clean shower pleasant mornings staff staff hotel friendly time theyd happily fill request spoke english repeat effort italian words noticed received cleaning staff prompt remade time 4pm waiters restaurant downstairs mornings prompt changing table sheets didnt appear english facilities hotel lifts quick didnt earlier reviewer idea hotel bar lounge 730pm found little expensive sitting drink day rome talk youd day hotel 2 desktop pcs free charge word processing internet charge eg 5 euros 2hrs offer wifi service prices try using wifi service hotel apparently allows login downstairs router outside hotel slightly inconvient annoyed id imagine youd success logging overall found hotel nice stay time rome reviews lot people tripadvisor harsh unless incredibly bad experiences picky id definitely hotel pleasure staying definitely deserves 4 stars disappointed breakfast mornings offer morning 3rd breakfast bland uninteresting found bowl cereal cup coffee juice leaving nice variety nevertheless id hotel 45 youre pleasant stay youre fussy arent expecting 5 star quality
